Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.description: A balanced mix of gin, citrus, and aromatics traditionally taken as a morning pick-me-up.
cocktails.instructions:
Rinse a chilled cocktail glass with absinthe and discard the excess.
Shake gin, Cointreau, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice with ice.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.description: A citrusy vodka cocktail with cranberry and orange notes.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Cuba Libre
cocktails.description: A simple mix of rum, cola, and lime for a refreshing long drink.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour rum and lime juice over the ice.
Top with cola and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A classic rum sour balancing lime and sugar.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktails.name: Dark 'n Stormy

cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour dark rum and lime juice over the ice.
Top with ginger beer.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Don's Special Daiquiri
cocktails.description: A tiki-style daiquiri with grapefruit and honey notes.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime slice.

cocktails.name: Dry Martini
cocktails.description: A timeless mix of gin and dry vermouth served icy cold.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, vermouth, and bitters into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an olive or a lemon twist.

cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well to create a foam.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with three coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Fernandito
cocktails.description: Argentina's favorite mix of Fernet and cola over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour Fernet over the ice.
Top with cola and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: Crisp gin and lemon topped with sparkling champagne.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled champagne flute.
Top with champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: French Connection
cocktails.description: Equal-parts blend of cognac and amaretto served over ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled rocks glass.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: French Martini
cocktails.description: Vodka shaken with raspberry liqueur and pineapple juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

cocktails.name: Garibaldi
cocktails.description: Italian mix of bitter Campari and fresh orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour in Campari and orange juice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin Basil Smash
cocktails.description: Herbal gin sour brightened with fresh basil.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle basil and simple syrup in a shaker.
Add gin, lemon juice, and ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass over ice.
Garnish with a basil leaf.

cocktails.name: Gin Fizz
cocktails.description: Classic gin sour lengthened with soda water.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Grand Margarita
cocktails.description: Premium take on the classic Margarita with tequila and Grand Marnier.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a margarita glass with salt.
Shake tequila, Grand Marnier, lime juice, and agave syrup with ice.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Grasshopper
cocktails.description: Creamy after-dinner mix of mint and chocolate liqueurs.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Hanky Panky
cocktails.description: Classic gin and vermouth cocktail with a hint of Fernet.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Hemingway Special
cocktails.description: A tart rum sour with grapefruit and maraschino liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Horse's Neck
cocktails.description: Cognac highball sharpened with ginger ale and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add cognac and bitters.
Top with ginger ale.
Garnish with a long lemon peel.

cocktails.name: IBA Tiki
cocktails.description: Fruity tiki blend of rums, juices, and exotic syrups.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients except garnishes into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a tiki glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with mint and pineapple.

cocktails.name: Illegal
cocktails.description: Smoky mezcal balanced with herbal Chartreuse and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Irish Coffee
cocktails.description: Warm blend of Irish whiskey, hot coffee, and cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Add brown sugar to a heatproof glass.
Pour in hot coffee and stir until dissolved.
Add Irish whisky and stir.
Float lightly whipped cream on top.

cocktails.name: John Collins
cocktails.description: Refreshing gin highball with lemon, sugar, and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a collins glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Jungle Bird
cocktails.description: Tiki favorite blending dark rum, Campari, and pineapple.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Kir
cocktails.description: Simple mix of white wine and blackcurrant liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour creme de cassis into a wine glass.
Top with white wine.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Last Word
cocktails.description: Equal-parts gin, Chartreuse, maraschino, and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.description: Vodka citrus martini with triple sec and sugar rim.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a cocktail glass with sugar.
Add vodka, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.description: Five-spirit sour lengthened with cola.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all spirits, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a highball glass filled with ice. 
Top up with cola and stir.
Garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.description: Rum-forward tiki classic with orange curaçao, lime, and orgeat.
cocktails.instructions:
Add rums, orange curaçao, lime juice, and orgeat into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: Spirit-forward mix of rye whisky, sweet vermouth, and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.description: Classic tequila sour balanced with triple sec and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a margarita glass with salt.
Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Martinez
cocktails.description: Historic gin and vermouth cocktail accented by maraschino and orange bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Mary Pickford
cocktails.description: Tropical rum and pineapple cocktail sweetened with maraschino and grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.description: Brunch favorite combining sparkling wine and fresh orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour orange juice into a chilled champagne flute.
Top with champagne.
Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.description: Bourbon refresher with muddled mint and sugar over crushed ice.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle mint leaves, sugar, and water in a rocks glass.
Fill the glass with crushed ice.
Add bourbon and stir until chilled.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Missionary's Downfall
cocktails.description: Blended tiki mix of rum, peach liqueur, pineapple, mint, and honey.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a blender with ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a highball glass.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.description: Cuban highball with rum, lime, mint, sugar, and sparkling soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle mint leaves and sugar with lime juice in a highball glass.
Add rum and fill the glass with crushed ice.
Top with soda water and gently stir.
Garnish with a mint sprig and lime slice.

cocktails.name: Monkey Gland
cocktails.description: Gin and orange cocktail with a hint of absinthe and grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, orange juice, absinthe, and grenadine into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: Vodka and ginger beer built over ice with a bright lime kick.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a copper mug with ice.
Add vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer and gently stir.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Naked and Famous
cocktails.description: Equal parts mezcal, Aperol, yellow chartreuse, and lime for a smoky, bittersweet sour.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.description: Classic Italian aperitif of gin, bitters, and sweet vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, Campari, and red vermouth into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: New York Sour
cocktails.description: Whiskey sour finished with a float of red wine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake to emulsify.
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Float red wine on top.

cocktails.name: Old Cuban
cocktails.description: Sparkling mix of aged rum, mint, lime, and champagne.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a shaker.
Add rum, lime juice, and bitters with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Top with champagne and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: Time-honored mix of whiskey, sugar, and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Place sugar in a rocks glass and saturate with bitters.
Add a splash of water and muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice and add bourbon.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange twist and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Paloma
cocktails.description: Refreshing tequila highball with grapefruit soda and lime.
cocktails.instructions:
Rim a highball glass with salt.
Fill the glass with ice and add tequila and lime juice.
Top with grapefruit soda and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Paper Plane
cocktails.description: Modern equal-parts cocktail of bourbon, Aperol, amaro, and lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Paradise
cocktails.description: Pre-Prohibition blend of gin, apricot brandy, and orange juice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.description: Smoky scotch cocktail with honey, ginger, and lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
Add blended scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup, and ginger syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Float Islay scotch on top and garnish with a slice of ginger.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.description: Tropical blend of rum, pineapple, and coconut cream.
cocktails.instructions:
Add rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice into a blender with crushed ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Pisco Punch
cocktails.description: Fruity highball of pisco with pineapple and citrus.
cocktails.instructions:
Add pisco, pineapple juice, lime juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Pisco Sour
cocktails.description: Peruvian classic with pisco, lime, and creamy egg white foam.
cocktails.instructions:
Add pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake to mix.
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish the foam with a few drops of Angostura bitters.

cocktails.name: Planter's Punch
cocktails.description: Jamaican rum punch with citrus, grenadine, and a touch of bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, lime juice, and grenadine into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Pour into a highball glass and top with soda water.
Dash bitters on top and garnish with a pineapple slice.

cocktails.name: Porn Star Martini
cocktails.description: A modern passion fruit martini served with a shot of prosecco.
cocktails.instructions:
Add vanilla vodka, passion fruit liqueur, passion fruit syrup, lime juice, and vanilla syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Serve with prosecco on the side.
Garnish with half a passion fruit.

cocktails.name: Porto Flip
cocktails.description: A rich blend of cognac, ruby port, and egg yolk topped with grated nutmeg.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cognac, ruby port, and egg yolk into a shaker with ice.
Shake vigorously.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with grated nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Rabo de Galo
cocktails.description: Brazilian mix of cachaça, Cynar, and red vermouth with an orange twist.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cachaça, red vermouth, and Cynar into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Ramos Fizz
cocktails.description: A frothy gin fizz with citrus, cream, and a hint of orange flower water.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, cream, egg white, orange flower water, and vanilla extract into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake vigorously.
Add ice and shake again until chilled.
Strain into a highball glass without ice.
Top with soda water.

cocktails.name: Remember the Maine
cocktails.description: A Manhattan variation with rye whisky, cherry heering, and a hint of absinthe.
cocktails.instructions:
Rinse a chilled cocktail glass with absinthe and discard the excess.
Add rye whisky, cherry heering, and red vermouth into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into the prepared glass.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Russian Spring Punch
cocktails.description: A sparkling vodka punch balanced with cassis, lemon, and berries.
cocktails.instructions:
Add vodka, creme de cassis, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with champagne.
Garnish with a lemon slice and blackberries.

cocktails.name: Rusty Nail
cocktails.description: Scotch whisky tempered with sweet, herbal Drambuie.
cocktails.instructions:
Pour scotch whiskey and Drambuie into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.description: New Orleans classic of rye whisky, sugar, Peychaud's bitters, and an absinthe rinse.
cocktails.instructions:
Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe and discard any excess.
Muddle the sugar with Peychaud's bitters in a mixing glass.
Add rye whisky and ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into the prepared glass without ice.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Sea Breeze
cocktails.description: Cranberry and grapefruit highball spiked with vodka.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add vodka, cranberry juice, and grapefruit juice.
Stir briefly.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.description: Fruity vodka highball with peach, orange, and cranberry.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Pour vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over the ice.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Sherry Cobbler
cocktails.description: Classic sherry cooler muddled with citrus and berries.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle orange slices and sugar in a cup glass.
Add sherry and fill the cup with crushed ice.
Stir well.
Garnish with orange slices and berries.

cocktails.name: Sidecar
cocktails.description: Cognac sour sweetened with orange liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cognac, Cointreau, and lemon juice into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.description: Tropical gin punch with cherry, pineapple, and bitters.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, cherry heering, Cointreau, Benedictine, pineapple juice, lime juice, grenadine, and bitters into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with soda water.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: South Side
cocktails.description: Herbal gin sour brightened with mint.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and mint leaves into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a mint leaf.

cocktails.name: Spicy Fifty
cocktails.description: Vanilla vodka sour shaken with elderflower, honey, and chili heat.
cocktails.instructions:
Muddle a slice of red chili pepper in a shaker.
Add vanilla vodka, elderflower liqueur, lime juice, and honey syrup with ice.
Shake well and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a red chili slice.

cocktails.name: Spritz
cocktails.description: Bittersweet aperitif of Aperol, prosecco, and soda.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a wine glass with ice.
Add prosecco and Aperol.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Stinger
cocktails.description: Brandy and crème de menthe served straight up.
cocktails.instructions:
Add cognac and white crème de menthe into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Suffering Bastard
cocktails.description: Brandy and gin highball lengthened with ginger beer.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, brandy, lime juice, and bitters into a shaker with ice.
Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.
Top with ginger beer.
Garnish with a mint sprig and an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.description: Tequila and orange highball layered with grenadine.
cocktails.instructions:
Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add tequila and orange juice and stir.
Slowly pour grenadine to create a sunrise effect.
Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Three Dots and a Dash
cocktails.description: Tiki mix of rum, spice, citrus, and honey, garnished with cherries.
cocktails.instructions:
Add aged rum, lime juice, orange juice, honey syrup, falernum, allspice dram, and bitters into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a tiki glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with three maraschino cherries.

cocktails.name: Tipperary
cocktails.description: Irish whiskey stirred with green Chartreuse and sweet vermouth.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Tommy's Margarita
cocktails.description: A simplified margarita using agave syrup instead of orange liqueur.
cocktails.instructions:
Add tequila, lime juice, and agave syrup into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Trinidad Sour
cocktails.description: Bitters-heavy sour with rye and orgeat for balance.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Tuxedo
cocktails.description: Dry gin martini variant with maraschino and absinthe.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Ve.n.to
cocktails.description: Grappa sour sweetened with honey and chamomile cordial.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon twist and grapes.

cocktails.name: Vesper
cocktails.description: James Bond's martini with gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc.
cocktails.instructions:
Add gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carre
cocktails.description: New Orleans classic combining rye, cognac, vermouth, and Benedictine.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice.
Stir well.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Whisky Sour
cocktails.description: Classic bourbon sour optionally enriched with egg white.
cocktails.instructions:
Add bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white into a shaker without ice.
Dry shake.
Add ice and shake again.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: White Lady
cocktails.description: Gin sour sweetened with triple sec and balanced with lemon.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
Shake well.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.description: Potent tiki classic blending multiple rums, citrus, and spice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients except the overproof rum into a blender with ice and blend briefly.
Pour into a tall glass.
Float the overproof rum on top.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Zombie
cocktails.description: Potent tiki classic blending multiple rums, citrus, and spice.
cocktails.instructions:
Add all ingredients except the overproof rum into a blender with ice and blend briefly.
Pour into a tall glass.
Float the overproof rum on top.
Garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry.
